content: So, americans. )) Now the time has come you learn democrasy from us. Our president Medvedev has started LJ community. No premoderation of comments. Just freedom of speech. Sometimes he replies at comments, not often, but hes a pres, he dont have much time for chat. Lots of comments, lots of visitors. Its a good thing. He is now more closer to nation. wish to you the same community.livejournal.com/blog_medvedev
